title: Return Policy
description: We accept returns within 30 days of purchase with the original receipt and packaging.
conditions: Product must be in original condition with all accessories and manuals included.
Software, opened consumables (like ink cartridges), and clearance items are non-returnable.
Refunds will be processed to the original payment method within 7-10 business days.
If the product is defective, customers may request an exchange instead of a refund.
Items purchased during sales events or promotions may have separate return conditions.
Return shipping costs are the customer's responsibility unless the item is defective.
Original packaging must be intact to qualify for a full refund.
A restocking fee of 10% may apply for items returned without original packaging or accessories.

title: Warranty Policy
description: We provide a standard 1-year warranty covering manufacturer defects and hardware malfunctions.
conditions: The warranty begins on the date of purchase and covers only the original purchaser.
Physical damage, water damage, and misuse are not covered.
Accessories and consumables (like batteries and chargers) are excluded unless stated otherwise.
Proof of purchase is required for warranty claims.
Customers must contact customer service to initiate a warranty claim.
Replacement or repair under warranty does not extend the warranty period.
The warranty is void if repairs are attempted by unauthorized personnel.
Extended warranty options may be available at the time of purchase for additional coverage.

title: Repair Policy
description: In-store repair services are available for select devices purchased from our store.
conditions: Only devices purchased from our store are eligible for repair services.
Repairs come with a 90-day warranty on parts and labor.
Repair times vary based on the device and availability of parts.
Diagnostic fees may apply if the repair is not covered by warranty.
Customers will be notified of any repair costs before proceeding.
Repairs may be delayed if specific parts are not in stock.
Devices left uncollected for over 30 days after repair completion may incur storage fees.
Repairs on items damaged by misuse may be declined or subject to additional fees.

title: Privacy Policy
description: We prioritize customer privacy and data security.
conditions: Personal information such as name, email, and billing information is collected for purchase and support purposes.
Data collected is encrypted and securely stored.
Data is used only for purchase, warranty, and service support purposes.
We do not share customer information with third parties unless required by law or for payment processing.
Customers can opt-out of promotional emails by updating their preferences.
Cookies are used on our website to improve user experience and analytics.
Credit card information is processed through secure, third-party payment gateways.
Customers may request deletion of their personal data by contacting customer support.

title: Delivery Policy
description: We offer delivery options for orders placed online and in-store.
conditions: Standard delivery takes 3-7 business days, depending on location.
Expedited shipping options are available for an additional fee.
Free delivery is offered on orders over $100.
We deliver only within the country and do not ship to P.O. boxes or APO/FPO addresses.
Customers will receive a tracking number once the order is shipped.
Signature may be required upon delivery for orders over $500.
Delivery delays may occur during holidays, sales events, or due to unforeseen circumstances.
Customers can track their orders through our website using the order ID and tracking number.
